line_1: Till not with ass and bull:
line_2: Nor work thy flax with wool.

line_1: Then Tommy roared like any bull
line_2: And said — his eyes with tears brim full —

line_1: Seizes the shaggy foretop of the bull,
line_2: Then back he stalks, of self-importance full,

line_1: Who e'er i'th' Grove saw the Lordly Bull,
line_2: Sigh to the fair, She like a loving Fool.
